Actions.Name: Convert to Pdf (Preview)
Actions.Description: Convert any type of office documents to PDF format. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/convert-to-pdf-flow-connector/

Actions.Name: Create a Thumbnail (Preview)
Actions.Description: Create thumbnail for the PDF document. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/create-thumbnail-flow-connector/

Actions.Name: Extract Pages (Preview)
Actions.Description: Extract the required pages from the PDF document. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/extract-pages-flow-connector/

Actions.Name: Merge (Preview)
Actions.Description: Merge multiple PDF documents into a single pdf document. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/merge-connector/

Actions.Name: PdfToExcel (Preview)
Actions.Description: Create XLSX spreadsheets from PDFs with tabular data . Even from an image you can generate an XLS. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/pdf-to-excel-connector/

Actions.Name: PdfToWord (Preview)
Actions.Description: Transform PDF documents to high quality editable DOCX files. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/pdf-to-word-connector/

Actions.Name: Protect Document (Preview)
Actions.Description: Protect the document with custom password. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/protect-document-flow-document/

Actions.Name: Rotate Document (Preview)
Actions.Description: Rotate the pages and in all directions. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/rotate-document-flow-connector/

Actions.Name: Split Document by Barcode (Preview)
Actions.Description: Split the PDF document by barcode types and filters. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/split-by-barcode-flow-connector/

Actions.Name: Split Document (Preview)
Actions.Description: Split the PDF document by page number or recurring pages. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/split-document-flow-connector/

Actions.Name: Stamp (Preview)
Actions.Description: Add a background watermark text to the PDF document. https://developer.pdf4me.com/docs/api/microsoft-flow/stamp-flow-connector/
